title: Ambient - Volume 1
description: 10 full length ambient themes with multiple loops and shorter edits
longDescription:
Preview the collection:

  • YouTube


"Ambient - Volume 1" features 10 ambient music themes suitable for sci-fi, fantasy, RPG, survival horror and futuristic projects. The arrangements include soft synthesizers, airy pads, minimal percussion elements, drones, textures, piano and organic sounds.

Every music theme comes with multiple loops and shorter edits for a total amount of 907Mb of music.


  • Entering The Cave: Full length (02:05), 1 Short edit, 3 Loops
  • Electronic Ambient Fractures: Full length (01:58), 4 Short edits, 10 Loops
  • Zen Ambient: Full length (02:2), 2 Short edits, 5 Loops
  • Futuristic Organic Background: Full length (02:09), 4 Short edits, 6 Loops
  • Inspirational Cinematic Background: Full length (02:12), 3 Short edits, 6 Loops
  • Glitch Crystals: Full length (01:31), 3 Short edits, 7 Loops
  • Peaceful Drones: Full length (02:43), 3 Short edits, 3 Loops
  • TimeLapse Background: Full length (04:06), 5 Short edits, 17 Loops
  • Sulphurea: Full length (02:03), 3 Short edits, 4 Loops
  • Urban Design: Full length (02:44), 4 Short edits, 6 Loops


Take a look: Total Game Music Collection - 500 High Quality music themes ideal for any game!

This pack is produced by Luca Tomassini a composer with more than 20 years of expertise in music production with multiple TV, feature films and multimedia placements.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  10 Full length tracks
  •  32 Short edits
  •  67 Loops

Number of Audio Wavs: 109

Number of Audio Cues: 109

Sample Rate/Bit Rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Does Music Loop: Yes

Minutes of Audio Provided: 85:29

Supported Development Platforms: All

Supported Target Build Platforms: All


- Terms of Usage and Licensing Notes outside the game engine.

All packages by Frequently Asked Music are meant to be used within Unreal Engine. Please contact us at studio@frequentlyaskedmusic.com for further clearance in case you want to use a specific track for other purposes - YouTube videos, social marketing, promo.
